author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
CD Projekt RED is staffing up for Cyberpunk 2 with a job post looking for a lead network engineer. Responsibilities would include developing and optimizing "multiplayer systems, including matchmaking." So it sounds like Cyberpunk 2 is going to include a multiplayer mode, possibly similar to the scrapped mode that was supposed to be post-launch content for Cyberpunk 2077. Cyberpunk 2 isn't supposed to go into full development until after The Witcher 4 is out the door, so it may be a long while before we hear more. In other news, Fortnite is going head-to-head with Roblox in the creator economy space, with Epic revealing plans to allow players to sell user-generated content. The real kicker: Epic is pushing incentives for creators to earn quite a bit more than they would with Roblox. And finally, more DLC content for Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds has leaked, thanks to some retailers selling copies early.

#IGN
title: Cyberpunk 2 Multiplayer Features Teased By CD Projekt Red Job Listing - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Check out the first minute of Trails in the Sky: First Chapter, a reimagined take on the beloved classic JRPG. Follow Estelle and Joshua as their journey begins in the Liberl Kingdom, a land of peace now threatened by dark conspiracies.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter - The First 20 Minutes of Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Hero’s will be streaming on Crunchyroll on October 6, 2025.

Akira Oda and his high school classmates are summoned to another world! While the other students are granted cheat abilities through the summoning, Akira merely gains the abilities of a mediocre “assassin.” However, his status soon surpasses “hero,” the strongest profession. After Akira becomes suspicious of the King behind the summoning, he is falsely framed for a crime and forced to flee.

#IGN #Anime
title: My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Hero’s - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
To Your Eternity Season 3 is coming to Crunchyroll this October!

Following the battles in Renril and the elimination of the Nokkers, Fushi awakens in the modern era. He enjoys a peaceful life surrounded by friends young and old. As ominous shadows begin to grow, Fushi learns of the true goals of his creator, The Beholder. Faced with new trials, the time is fast approaching for Fushi to make the ultimate decision.

#IGN #Anime
title: To Your Eternity Season 3 - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation Season 3! The new season will be streaming on Crunchyroll in 2026.
When a 34-year-old underachiever gets run over by a truck, his story doesn't end there. Reincarnated in a new world as an infant, Rudy will seize every opportunity to live the life he's always wanted. Armed with new friends, some freshly acquired magical abilities, and the courage to do the things he's always dreamed of, he's embarking on an epic adventure—with all of his past experience intact!

#IGN #Anime
title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation Season 3 - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Hyperfunk teaser trailer for this upcoming action-adventure skateboarding/skating/biking platformer game from the creators of Bomb Rush Cyberfunk. The Hyperfunk teaser trailer showcases the vibrant and stylish world, cool tricks, and more.

Hyperfunk is 2 seconds per second of evolved funkstyle. Battle rival crews, hang out online, explore the city, do some crazy tricks and blast through the streets. Hyperfunk is an extreme trick and graffiti game from a bright future. Society is shaped by the effects of the Hyper, the online space, as various graffiti crews compete in reality with style and ideology of how to interpret this new world. Use your skates, skateboard or BMX to do tricks that fuel your personal boostpack. The higher your combo score, the faster you can boost, up to ridiculous speeds.
title: Hyperfunk - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Teaser Trailer #2 for Marvel Animation’s Marvel Zombies, an animated horror installment to the Marvel Cinematic Universe distributed by Marvel Studios. This series re-contextualizes the Marvel Universe as Earth's mightiest heroes go head-to-head against a zombie outbreak, turning even the strongest of them into undead nightmares. Marvel Animation’s Marvel Zombies will be a four-part event on September 24, streaming exclusively on Disney+.

After the Avengers are overtaken by a zombie plague, a desperate group of survivors discover the key to bringing an end to the super-powered undead, racing across a dystopian landscape and risking life and limb to save their world. 
 
Marvel Zombies stars Elizabeth Olsen, Paul Rudd, Florence Pugh, David Harbour, Tessa Thompson, Simu Liu, Awkwafina, Hailee Steinfeld, Wyatt Russell, Randall Park, Iman Vellani, Dominique Thorne, and more. The series is executive produced by Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Brad Winderbaum, Dana Vasquez-Ebe
title: Marvel Animation's Marvel Zombies - Official Teaser Trailer #2 (2025) Elizabeth Olsen, Paul Rudd

author: IGN
description:

Check out the Launch Trailer for Break Arts 3, a mech-based action shooter racing game developed by MercuryStudio. Players will fight through the race track in customizable mechs with more options to tweak than ever before. Break Arts 3 is available now for PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Ventrue Clan Trailer for Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2, the upcoming vampiric RPG developed by The Chinese Room. Players will be able to get a look at the Ventrue clan hailing from Seattle. Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is launching on October 21 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).

Take a look at the Cinematic Trailer for Lessaria: Fantasy Kingdom Sim, a real-time strategy game developed by Rockbee Team. description:

Players will soon be able to access Character Pack 2, which packs six new playable characters alongside a brand-new stage, the First Demon World. The Character Pack 2 for Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero is launching on September 25 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'World and Factions' Trailer for Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade, the third-person action RPG based on the iconic Final Fantasy 7 developed by Square Enix. Players can get the rundown from Jesse of Team Avalanche on the world of Midgar, alongside the factions at play, whether it be Team Avalanche themselves or the sinister Shinra Electric Power Company. Learn more about The Turks, Cloud, and even Sephiroth in Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade, launching on January 22 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox PC, and Nintendo Switch 2, with the game being available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#FinalFantasy7RemakeIntergrade #Gaming #IGN
title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade - Official 'World and Factions' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get your last look at Jump Space before jumping into it yourself on PC (via Steam Early Access) or Xbox (via Game Preview) today. Jump Space is a four-player, PvE first-person shooter in which you and your friends pilot, protect, and have space battles in your ship before touching down on mysterious planets to go on FPS missions. Check it out on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1757300/Jump_Space/ 

Check out our Early Access review if you missed it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lkt3-Ct_Xb8

#IGN #Gaming
title: Jump Space: Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at 'A Very Unprofessional' Developer Overview Video for Baby Steps, a comedic adventure walking simulator developed by Gabe Cuzzillo, Maxi Boch, and Bennett Foddy. Players can get an extensive look at the gameplay loop of Baby Steps straight from the developers with some sort of professionalism as they embark into the open world. Baby Steps is launching on September 23 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Baby Steps - Official 'A Very Unprofessional' Developer Overview Video

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Goddess of Victory: Nikke x Resident Evil for the upcoming collaboration between the sci-fi RPG shooter game and the survival horror series. The Goddess of Victory: Nikke x Resident Evil collaboration event brings Jill Valentine, Ada Wong, and Claire Redfield from the Resident Evil series to Goddess of Victory: Nikke. Goddess of Victory: Nikke is available on PC, iOS, and Android mobile devices. The Goddess of Victory: Nikke x Resident Evil 'Reborn Evil' collaboration event begins September 24, 2025.

The story unfolds in the ruins of a long-forgotten mansion, where a mysterious NEO-Virus infection has begun to spread. As the A.C.P.U. Squad, D, and the Commander investigate, the team encounters Jill Valentine and her allies.

#GoddessOfVictoryNikke #ResidentEvil #Gaming
title: Goddess of Victory: Nikke x Resident Evil - Official Reborn Evil Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Donkey Kong Bananza's DK Island and Emerald Rush DLC reviewed by Logan Plant on Nintendo Switch 2.

"The best part about Donkey Kong Bananza’s DK Island & Emerald Rush DLC is that it gives me a reason to keep experimenting in one of my favorite playgrounds Nintendo has ever created. DK Island is a nostalgic rush that prioritizes fun callbacks to Rare’s golden era over stuff to actually do. Despite the warm, fuzzy feelings I had while exploring, I can’t help but think this would have been more fitting as a final postgame reward in Bananza itself rather than DLC locked behind a paywall. But the bulk of this expansion is housed in Emerald Rush, which let me unleash DK’s craziest parkour possibilities and strategically balance each transformation’s strengths to set new high scores. Its perk system creates unique ways to play you’d never consider in the original campaign, and it smartly returns to old locations and tests your knowledge of important places in a way that feels like a fitting
title: Donkey Kong Bananza: DK Island and Emerald Rush Review

Tune in for a special IGN partnership with Kojima Productions for their 10th Anniversary Livestream, Beyond the Strand. The stream will take place on Monday, Sept. 22 at 9pm PT, which translates to Tuesday, Sept. 23 at 1pm in Japan. 
Fans can expect to see a "glimpse into future projects" that are in development at Kojima Productions, the studio behind the award-winning game, Death Stranding.
